outcome: Understand the fundamentals of the Python programming language
Write syntactically and semantically correct Python programs
Create Python Desktop and Web applications
Analyze program requirements and design solutions using Python
Debug and test Python programs to ensure correctness
Utilize Python libraries and frameworks for application development
Apply object-oriented programming principles in Python
Implement data structures and algorithms using Python
Work with databases and APIs in Python applications
Collaborate on software development projects using version control systems
